# bitcoin-inscription-indexer

> Attempt to index all inscriptions in the Bitcoin blockchain, including ASCII strings of length >= 20 and media like images. Includes inscription transaction IDs and has deterministic ordering. Previously called: "bitcoin-strings-with-txids".

## Overview

bitcoin-inscription-indexer is an open-source project by nirholas. Attempt to index all inscriptions in the Bitcoin blockchain, including ASCII strings of length >= 20 and media like images. Includes inscription transaction IDs and has deterministic ordering. Previously called: "bitcoin-strings-with-txids".

## Repository

- URL: https://github.com/nirholas/bitcoin-inscription-indexer
- Language: Python
- License: MIT
- Author: nirholas

Contributions are welcome. See CONTRIBUTING.md for guidelines.
